attributes.action: Close down the CSA ( Child Support Agency )
attributes.additional_details: For over 15 years the Government have aloud the CSA to destroy peoples lives , I want a FAIR maintenance system put in place that is fair to both Resident  AND None Resident Parent BUT most of all a system that benefits the Child(ren) . At the moment the system allows Fathers who dont want to pay for their Children to  avoid doing so by going self employed and allows  Mothers who DO receive  fair and regular  payments from the Father to use the system to STEEL money which will NOT be spent on the Child .
